1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.1:
added jer support,
fixed an everlasting food duplication glitch
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.2: fixed a bug that caused servers to crash when using the star cloak
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0:
added optional support for artemislib,
 fixed a crash with everlasting food,
 fixed certain bauble effects staying active when unequipped,
 added dimension whitelists for worldgen,
 fixed worldgen occurring in flat worlds
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.2.2: added a config option to always show tooltips
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.2.3: fixed a crash related to mimics
